channel.title: Zlib on Tori Code
channel.description: Recent content in Zlib on Tori Code

item.title: Node.js Compress File into gzip Format
item.description:
Using Node.js built-in fs and zlib modules to compress a file into gzip format. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); For example, we have the Document.pdf file as below located at D:\ToriCode\Nodejs directory.
Compress file using fs and zlib modules Below Node.js code example to compress Document.pdf file above to compressed file named Document.pdf.gz let fs = require('fs'); let zlib = require('zlib'); let gzip = zlib.
